title: Reds make offers to Dunn, Lopez
subtitle: Reds make offers to Dunn, Lopez
body: The Reds don't want to get in the position of "beating" or "losing to" their own players. Arbitration is a contentious process that the club hopes to avoid. But should contract talks with Adam Dunn and Felipe Lopez come down to an arbitration hearing, the Reds now know what to expect, one way or another. Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
